question: ‘Parinam Manjusha’ is the digital academic repository of which institution?
option4: All India Council for Technical Education
explanation:
The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) is to enable students their digital academic documents of class X and XII using Facial Recognition System.
The live image of the student will be matched with the photograph on the CBSE admit card. The application will be available in the digital academic repository of Central Board of Secondary Education- ‘Parinam Manjusha’ and Digi Locker.
